species.name: vulpix
descriptions: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.
As it develops,  its single white tail gains color and splits into six. It is quite warm and cuddly.
As its body grows larger, its six warm tails become more beautiful, with a more luxurious coat of fur.
At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: drought
abilities.effect: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
